mapper.select: SELECT I.INQUIRY_NO AS inquiryNo, I.TITLE, I.DIVISION, M.EMAIL AS inquiryWriterEmail, I.CRE_DATE AS inquiryDate, I.CONTENT AS inquiryContent, MEM.EMAIL AS answerWriterEmail, IC.INQUIRY_COMMENT_NO AS inquiryCommentNo, IC.CONTENT AS answerContent, IC.CRE_DATE AS answerDate, CASE WHEN IC.CONTENT IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS answerTermination FROM INQUIRY I JOIN MEMBER M ON I.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN INQUIRY_COMMENT IC ON I.INQUIRY_NO = IC.INQUIRY_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER MEM ON IC.MEMBER_NO = MEM.MEMBER_NO WHERE I.INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY_COMMENT SET CONTENT = #{content}, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE INQUIRY_COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM INQUIRY WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{term}, '%') ORDER BY CRE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_COMMENT (INQUIRY_COMMENT_NO, INQUIRY_NO, CONTENT, MEMBER_NO) VALUES (INQUIRY_COMMENT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryNo}, #{content}, #{memberNo})
INSERT INTO INQUIRY (INQUIRY_NO, NOTICE_BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, TITLE, DIVISION, CRE_DATE, CONTENT) VALUES (INQUIRY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL,1, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{division}, #{creDate}, #{content})
